General.Name: Suzhou Xianglou New Material Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Suzhou Xianglou New Material Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of customized precision stamping special steel materials. The company provides carbon structural steel, alloy structural steel, spring steel, bearing steel, and carbon tool steel materials. Its products are primarily used for various types of automotive fine blanking parts, and the application range covers automotive engine systems, transmission and clutch systems, seat systems, interior systems, and other structural and functional parts. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Suzhou, China.
